title: Applicability
context: ยง84-2 Applicability. This chapter shall apply to every nominated, appointed, or elected officer, employee, and candidate to elected office of the State and for election to the constitutional convention, but excluding justices and judges; provided that in the case of elected delegates and employees of the constitutional convention, this chapter shall apply only to the enforcement and administration of the code of ethics adopted by the constitutional convention. [L 1972, c 163, pt of ยง1; am L 1979, c 91, ยง3] Case Notes Commission has no jurisdiction to continue with charges against employee after employee resigns. 53 H. 373, 494 P.2d 559.
